ygData.subject: Re: bazaar questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Silk is for tailoring.  Something else that sells well are hides, especially hopper hides.  I hunted all kinds of hoppers and their hides can be used for a lot
ygData.messageBody:
Silk is for tailoring. Something else that sells well are hides,
especially hopper hides. I hunted all kinds of hoppers and their
hides can be used for a lot of mid-level tailoring. And leather
padding is needed for a lot of the planar armor and sells great.

I suggest you have a look at EQTraders. There you can find all the
tradeskill stuff and see what else people need.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Outrider of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Robert" <Rengar65@y...> wrote:
> I have been farming spiders for there silks, but they no longer
> provide me with exp. What other items are as prized as the silks
in
> the bazaar?
>
> Also does any one know why the silks are so sought after?
